summary: Adds craftable copies of Daedric items using meshes from the Iron armour and weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Fifth Mod! 

Having received feedback on my 'Daedric Armor to Iron' and 'Daedric Weapons to Iron' mods, I decided to make this little alternative. For those of you who don't want to completely replace the appearance of Daedric gear, this mod allows you to forge functionally identical Daedric items that use the Iron meshes. Similar results to the other two mods, but you can still decorate your house with Bethesda's handiwork. 

Other mods seen in the screenshots: 
Brigandine Armors (Another one of mine, not published yet) 
aMidianBorn Book of Silence - Weapons/Armor (available on the Nexus and highly recommended) 

Please do not upload this file elsewhere without my permission. Hell, why would you bother? This mod took about ten minutes to make with the creation kit (not including playtesting). 

Credits: 
BorderWise (that guy who always roleplays homeless characters) 
Bethesda, for making the game that destroyed anything resembling a regular sleeping pattern that I had. 

Version 1.0: Added 'Daedric Iron' variants of Daedric items to the forging and tempering lists.
author: BorderWise
